Package com.wm.xmldata.xmldocumenttype

This package contains classes that assist in accessing Document Types in an existing namespace or the ad-hoc creation of Document Types in a temporary namespace.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    XmlAttributeItem
    This interface identifies classes that may appear in an XmlAttributeList: XmlAttribute, and XmlAttributeRef.
    XmlContent
    This interface identifies classes that may be used to describe complex type content.
    XmlModelItem
    This interface identifies classes that are used to describe the content of XmlGroup models.
    XmlType
    This interface identifies classes that are used to describe types.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    XmlAll
    This class represents an XmlData All group in an XmlDataWorkspace.
    XmlAny
    This class represents the 'any' wildcard content in an XmlDataWorkspace.
    XmlAnyAttribute
    Defines the AnyAttribute property for a complex type.
    XmlAnyType
    This class represents the XmlData anyType content in an XmlDataWorkspace.
    XmlAttribute
    This class represents an Xml Attribute definition in an XmlDataWorkspace.
    XmlAttributeList
    This class represents a list of Attributes in an XmlDataWorkspace
    XmlAttributeRef
    This class represents Xml Attribute references in an XmlDataWorkspace.
    XmlChoice
    This class represents an XmlData Choice group in an XmlDataWorkspace.
    XmlComplexType
    This class represents an XmlData complexType in a workspace
    XmlComplexTypeRef
    This class represents an XmlData complexType reference in a workspace.
    XmlDataSchemaConverter
    Converts the scripted form of an XmlData Document Type specification to actual XmlData Document Type NSNodes (e.g.
    XmlDataTempNamespace  
    XmlDataWorkspace
    Provides a workspace in which XmlData Records and Fields can be accessed or created on an ad hoc basis.
    XmlElement
    This class represents an XmlData Element definition an XmlDataWorkspace.
    XmlElementRef
    This class represents an XmlData ElementRef definition in an XmlDataWorkspace.
    XmlGroup
    The superclass for XmlSequence, XmlChoice, and XmlAll.
    XmlRecordComparator  
    XmlSequence
    This class represents an XmlData sequence in an XmlDataWorkspace
    XmlSimpleType
    Define a simple type.
    XmlSubstitution
    This class is used to define the members of a substation group.
    XmlWrapper
    This class represents a wrapper for a global element.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SchemaConverterException  
    SchemaConverterException.ConflictingProperty
    Thrown when a script contains a component definition with conflicting properties.
    SchemaConverterException.InvalidComponent
    Thrown when a script contains an invalid component type.
    SchemaConverterException.InvalidProperty
    Thrown when a script contains a component definition with invalid properties.
    SchemaConverterException.UndefinedPrefix
    Thrown whne a script contains a prefix this not defined.

Package com.wm.xmldata.xmldocumenttype Description

This package contains classes that assist in accessing Document Types in an existing namespace or the ad-hoc creation of Document Types in a temporary namespace.

By convention, XmlData Document Types ate organized in a namespace folder using the following convention: 

     base-folder                  this is the base folder under which the XmlData namespace objects are created
         namespace-1              the folder name is the same as the namespace URI subject to special character translation
             schema               the schema for the namespace
             elements             the parent folder of all elements
                 element-1        a global element of the specified name
                     ...          ... one is created for each global element
                 element-n
             complexTypes         the parent folder of all complexTypes in the namespace
                 complex=type-1   a named complexType
                     ...          ... one is created for each named complexType
                 complex=type-n
             wrapper-1            a Document Type containing a single ref to the like-named global element (essentially the schema for an XML Document Element)
                 ...              ... one is create for each global element
             wrapper-n
         namespace-2
             ...

The XmlDataWorkspace class is used to create a workspace that can create temporary XmlData namespace objects or to gain access to an existing namespace with pre-existing namespace objects.

Classes are provided to create a fully functional collection of XmlData Document Types. These classes include:

  • XmlAll -- create an all model group
  • XmlAny -- create an any wildcard particle
  • XmlAnyAttribute -- create an anyAttribute wildcard
  • XmlAnyType -- create an anyType
  • XmlAttribute -- create an Attribute
  • XmlAttributeList-- create a list of Attributes for use by a complexType
  • XmlAttributeRef -- create an Attribute reference for use in an AttributeList
  • XmlChoice -- create a choice group
  • XmlComplexType -- create a complexType
  • XmlComplexTypeRef -- create a complexType reference
  • XmlElement -- create an element
  • XmlElementRef -- create an element reference
  • XmlSequence -- create a sequence
  • XmlSimpleType -- create a simpleType (currently limited to unconstrained String)
  • XmlSubstitution -- specify the members of a substitution group
  • XXmlWrapper -- create a wrapper for a global element; i.e. an XmlData Document type containing a single element ref to a like-named global element. This is essentially the type describing an XML document element

The XmlDataSchemaConverter class is used to create a collection of XmlData Document Types from a String using a script representation.
